list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Quick summary – what changed / improved:
Scrollable list of categories (important when you have 15–40 categories) Each row: checkbox + bold name + short description preview Live status update when checking/unchecking Cleaner visual hierarchy Still zero external dependencies main layout changed to grid

task.summary:
Phase 1 achievements:
Admin rights check + auto-relaunch Nice looking basic Tkinter GUI Menu bar Load JSON file Display categories list Show category details on selection Status messages Basic error handling

Phase 1 achievements:
Admin rights check + auto-relaunch Nice looking basic Tkinter GUI Menu bar Load JSON file Display categories list Show category details on selection Status messages Basic error handling

Phase 1 achievements:
Admin rights check + auto-relaunch Nice looking basic Tkinter GUI Menu bar Load JSON file Display categories list Show category details on selection Status messages Basic error handling
polished UI + app icon

Phase 2 – Checkboxes & Selection Tracking Main goals for this phase:
Replace the simple Listbox with category items that have checkboxes Track which categories are selected Show basic feedback about current selection Prepare the ground for the future "Apply" button

Quick summary – what changed / improved:
Scrollable list of categories (important when you have 15–40 categories) Each row: checkbox + bold name + short description preview Live status update when checking/unchecking Cleaner visual hierarchy Still zero external dependencies main layout changed to grid
